comprehensive_overview: NCBI Table2ASN is a tool provided by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) for converting simple Sanger sequencing results and assembly annotations into ASN.1 format, which is required for submission to GenBank. It automates the process of creating sequence records with annotations and metadata that are compatible with GenBank submission standards.
core_features: Converts Sanger sequencing results and assembly annotations to ASN.1 format
Automates creation of sequence records with annotations and metadata
Ensures compatibility with GenBank submission standards
